content.p: The crumb trail template works like a vertical slice through the current navigation. Each node, from the current page, up to the home page, is represented.

Note that the home page is a sibling to all top-level pages. This approach isn't as pure as having all top-level pages as children of the home page. If a pure approach is required, changes will need to be made to the crumb trail template.
The crumbtrail is controlled by the crumb-trail template.
